resources.string: This App was developed to help estimate the minimum solar power requirement for your home or office. It is very simple and easy to use.
To get started with Solar Calculator, follow the following instructions:
1. Click on the greater than button ">". This will open the page where appliances can be added.
2. To add appliances click on the floating "+" button. This will open a page where one can input the name of the appliance and the power rating.

3. Enter the name of the appliance in the provided text field. Appliances may include ceiling fan, television, radio, blender, laptop, iron, standing fan, microwave, refrigerator, deep freezer, vacuum cleaner and other home appliances.

4. Enter the power rating of the appliance. The power rating is a quantity that describes the total electrical power required for normal operation of an electric appliance. This is listed as part of the name plate data attached to the appliance. The power rating is expressed in either Watts(W) or Kilowatts(KW).
5. Click the "save appliance" button to save the details entered in the text fields.
6. Save as many appliance as required and then click the "calculate" button to display the final results.
